children *.description: Children callback, provides current status and copy function as an argument
children *.description_zh: Children 回调，提供 current status 和 copy 函数作为参数

timeout.description: Copied status timeout in ms, 1000 by default
timeout.description_zh: 复制状态超时（以毫秒为单位），默认为 1000

value *.description: Value that will be copied to the clipboard when the button is clicked
value *.description_zh: 单击按钮时将复制到剪贴板的值
